content: *More photos coming soon!Introducing the NEW [and long overdue] 2022 Bitcoin Penny® Copper Collection!THE 2022 BITCOIN PENNY® COPPER COLLECTIONThe Bitcoin Penny Company is proud to present the NEW 2022 Bitcoin Penny® Copper Collection of commemorative coins! As always, these coins may be found with two different mint marks. The majority of these coins feature the mint mark “NFD” which stands for one of our latest projects: Bitcoin Penny® Non-Fungible Doodles!. (More info coming soon!) However, a select few coins were created with the "SN" mint mark and feature the "S. Nakamoto" signature script on the back. These special coins will have VERY LIMITED CIRCULATION and will be made available within select Bitcoin Penny® products ONLY. (Please see our product list below.) As usual, this is a fun little homage to the classic hobby of coin roll hunting, and we hope you enjoy discovering these tiny treasures inside each of our Bitcoin Penny® Classic Rolls and Short Rolls! Good luck, and happy hunting!PRODUCTS Air-Tite™ Protective Case w/ White Foam Ring — $1.00 | Available     One (1) genuine Air-Tite™ brand protective case that fits our coins PERFECTLY!2022 Bitcoin Penny® Commemorative Coin (Single, x1) — $5.00 | SOLD OUT     One (1) standard mint NFD collectible coin.     Production limited to 200 only.2022 Bitcoin Penny® Short Roll (x20 Coins) — $50.00 | SOLD investor!     Specially hand-rolled in our iconic cherry red paper!     Wrapped in our “bulletproof” sleeve for ultimate protection!     Individually serial numbered as XX / TEN.     Production limited to 10 only.     BONUS: Bitcoin Penny® Special Edition Rolls come with the extra special bonus of one (1) matching oversized 39mm SN mint mark Commemorative Coin!      IMPORTANT: As a courtesy to our longtime customers, the 2022 Special Edition Rolls will be placed on reserve for 24 hours. All owners of a Special Edition Roll from last year may request to order the matching number from this year. This has been a tradition for the last seven years, and we'd like to continue this tradition for one more year. After 24 hours, all unclaimed 2022 Special Edition Rolls will be released for sale to the general public on a first come, first served basis. Please feel free to request that your name be put on the waiting list for any unclaimed / available 2022 Special Edition Rolls.      ROLL No.01 / TEN SOLD     ROLL No.02 / TEN SOLD     ROLL No.03 / TEN SOLD     ROLL No.04 / TEN SOLD     ROLL No.05 / TEN SOLD     ROLL No.06 / TEN SOLD     ROLL No.07 / TEN SOLD     ROLL No.08 / TEN SOLD     ROLL No.09 / TEN SOLD     ROLL No.10 / TEN SOLDPURCHASING & PAYMENTSThe new 2022 Bitcoin Penny® Copper Collection[/b] is available exclusively to BitcoinTalk Forum members for one week. After that time, you may place your orders directly on our website at BitcoinPenny.com. Until then, please feel free to place your orders below or via private message. We will confirm your order, payment options, and shipping details via private message. Please note that we are unable to alter prices on international orders for the purpose of avoiding VAT, duties, and other customs charges. Official invoice prices will be based on the above USD values. Thank you. DOODLESYes, you'll receive one free Bitcoin Penny® doodle card with your purchase! I'm just a little one-man shop that has accidentally grown too large over the last couple years for my limited skill set and time availability. I still do most of everything all by myself, so I often fall behind on some things — website updates, product photography, bookkeeping, emails, and (unfortunately) shipping. (Sadly, I don't make enough money to hire another employee, but I'm working on that now.) I appreciate that you've made your concern public. That gives me the swift kick in the butt that I sometimes need to get my priorities back on the right track. After all, customer service is EVERYTHING, and I've undoubtedly slipped a bit lately. I apologize for that.However, I have good news, my friend. All paid orders, including yours, were shipped out yesterday. I'll send the individual tracking numbers shortly via PM.In the meantime, please rest assured that your goodies are on the way. Thanks again for the much-needed recalibration, Abiky!Regards,Chris
